title: Job Openings at Large House Limited
content:
Large House Limited is a leading visual merchandising agency specializing in the creation of dynamic marketing assets such as gondolas, mobile bars, free-standing units, and more. We pride ourselves on our innovative designs that seamlessly blend creativity and functionality, enhancing brand visibility and driving impactful trade marketing campaigns.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Executive Assistant

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time (On site)

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive and highly organized Executive Assistant for one of our Director, who is a Food Content Creator, also the CEO of The Mindful Moms and Hungry Dolphin.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role inprovidingprofessional and personal support to the CEO.
	The ideal candidate must be sharp, resourceful, and adaptable, with the confidence to handle multiple priorities in a fast-paced, creative environment.


Responsibilities


	Support the CEO’s social media presence and brand-related activities.
	Manage the CEO’s daily schedule, meetings, and correspondence.
	Coordinate travel, events, and logistics for both business and personal engagements.
	Prepare documents, reports, and presentations as needed.
	Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism.
	Maintain effective communication with clients, partners, and team members.
	Anticipate needs and ensure smooth day-to-day operations.


Requirements


	1–2 years of experience as an Executive Assistant
	Excellent communication, organizational, and multitasking skills.
	Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.
	Social media savvy and comfortable working around high-profile individuals.
	Must be proactive, reliable, and able to work with minimal supervision.
	Must reside on mainland, preferably Ikeja, Maryland, Anthony and its axis.


Salary
N120,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 5th December, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: adejinmirofiat@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Production Associate

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Operating production equipment and machinery
	Ensuring the production line runs smoothly and efficiently
	Performing quality checks on finished products/projects
	Maintaining accurate records of production data and reporting any issues to the supervisor
	Inspect finished products for quality and adherence to specifications
	Maintain inventory of materials and report shortages.
	Proficiency in operating manufacturing/production machinery.
	Attention to detail for quality control and ability to spot the minutest errors.
	Keep accurate records of production and inventory.
	Communicate with team members and supervisors to ensure efficient workflow.
	Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to increase efficiency and reduce waste.
	Following production schedules and meeting production targets/deadlines


Requirements / Skills


	First-degree / HND or its equivalent
	Experience working in a manufacturing/production or FMCG environment
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
	Time management skills to meet production deadlines.
	Excellent and effective communication skills and ability to work well in a team
	Ability to follow standard operating procedures
	Strong attention to detail
	Strong organizational skills.
	Ability to take initiative and work with little or no supervision
	Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot production issues
	Basic knowledge of machinery and production processes
	The ability to use Corel Draw is preferable and would be an added advantage
	Effective communication and teamwork abilities.
	Basic computer skills for documentation purposes.
	Excellent attention to detail.
	Strong problem-solving skills.
	Detail-oriented.
	Team player.
	Proactive.
	Reliable.
	Strong work ethic.
	Adaptable.


Application Closing Date: 27th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: hr@thelargehouse.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) 3D Artist / Graphic Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are currently seeking a highly skilled and creative Product 3D Modeler to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in Blender 3D and possess the expertise to translate conceptual designs into detailed 3D models.
	The selected candidate will play a crucial role in managing the entire product lifecycle, from initial design concepts to physical fabrication in collaboration with our skilled artisans.


Responsibilities


	3D Modeling: Create detailed and visually appealing 3D models of marketing assets, including signages, gondolas, mobile bars, and free-standing units, using Blender 3D.
	Lounge remodeling, ability to conceptualize designs for bars, lounges and clubs and also supervise their transformation
	Design Interpretation: Collaborate with the design team to understand and interpret conceptual designs, ensuring accurate representation in the 3D models.
	Project Management: Oversee the entire product development process, managing the project from design inception to physical fabrication.
	Collaboration: Work closely with artisans and craftsmen to ensure seamless transition from digital design to physical realization, providing necessary guidance and support.
	Quality Control: Ensure that the final physical products align with the initial design vision and quality standards.
	Innovation: Stay abreast of industry trends and technological advancements to bring innovative ideas and solutions to the design and fabrication processes.


Requirements and Skills


	Minimum of First Degree
	2 - 5 years of proven experience as a 3D Modeler, project administrator with at least 5 years experience in an FMCG preferably in a visual merchandising or related field.
	Proficiency in Blender 3D is mandatory.
	Photoshop and corel draw or illustrator
	Strong portfolio showcasing a range of 3D modeling projects.
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
	Project management skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks and deadlines.
	Knowledge of fabrication processes and materials.
	Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.
	Solid technical background, with understanding or hands-on experience in fabrication.
	Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills
	Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office
	Excellent leadership and managerial skill
	Trustworthy and reliable.


Application Closing Date: 25th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: hr@thelargehouse.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at Firstnext News Nigeria Limited
content:
Firstnext News Nigeria Limited is a dynamic and innovative television station dedicated to delivering accurate, timely, and engaging news and entertainment content. We aim to inform, educate, and inspire our audience through high-quality programming. With a commitment to journalistic integrity and creativity, Firstnext Newscontinues to grow its reach, connecting viewers with stories that matter.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) News Anchor / Reporter

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Serves as the face and voice of a news broadcast, delivering stories clearly, accurately, and professionally on live or recorded television.
	Presents scripted and unscripted news using a teleprompter or prepared notes, maintaining a calm and professional demeanor during live broadcasts.
	Research news topics thoroughly to ensure accuracy, relevance, and context in all coverage.
	Writes, edits, and prepares news scripts for live or recorded presentation, ensuring clarity, factual accuracy, and engaging delivery.
	Introduces news segments including weather, sports, interviews, and field reports with proper pacing, tone, and clarity. Responds swiftly to breaking news, providing accurate, real-time updates, and adjusts the program flow in coordination with producers.
	Stays informed on local, national, and international current events, and researches key topics and interview subjects to ensure accurate reporting.
	The role involves both in-studio responsibilities and outside work, such as reporting from the field, conducting on-site interviews, and covering live events outside of the studio when required. Rehearses challenging names, terminology, or story details prior to going on air.
	Conducts live and recorded interviews with newsmakers, eyewitnesses, and subject matter experts, asking thoughtful and relevant questions.
	Manages difficult or sensitive interviews professionally and maintains neutrality throughout the discussion.
	Works closely with producers, camera operators, and control room staff to ensure a smooth, well-timed broadcast. Ensures all content meets ethical standards, avoiding bias or misinformation, and follows legal, copyright, and editorial guidelines.
	Maintains credibility, impartiality, and professionalism both on-screen and in public.
	Stays up to date with media trends, newsroom technologies, and evolving viewer preferences.
	Demonstrates a deep commitment to accuracy, public service, and effective storytelling.


Required Qualifications and Skills


	A degree in Journalism, Media, or a related field is preferred
	A good understanding of ethical journalism standards.
	Excellent writing, speaking, and research skills.
	Confidence in front of a camera or microphone.
	Ability to work under pressure, meet deadlines, and have previous reporting experience.


Application Closing Date: 18th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: firstnextofficial@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Director

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job details


	We are seeking an experienced and strategic Director to oversee the overall operations of our TV station.
	The DirectorM will be responsible for managing the station’s day-to-day operations, ensuring profitability, maintaining high-quality programming, and expanding audience reach.
	This role requires strong leadership, business acumen, and a deep understanding of the broadcast industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide strategic leadership and direction for all station operations, including programming, marketing, production, finance, and human resources.
	Develop and implement business plans to increase viewership, revenue, and market share.
	Ensure all programming meets quality standards, regulatory requirements, and aligns with the station’s brand and vision.
	Oversee budgeting, financial planning, and cost management to ensure profitability and operational efficiency.
	Lead, mentor, and manage all department heads and staff, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment.
	Build and maintain relationships with advertisers, sponsors, partners, and regulatory bodies.
	Develop and monitor performance metrics for programming, audience engagement, and operational efficiency.
	Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activity to identify opportunities for growth and innovation.
	Ensure compliance with broadcasting regulations and corporate policies.
	Represent the station publicly, including at industry events, stakeholder meetings, and community engagements.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Media, Communications, Business Administration, or a related field (Master’s preferred).
	Extensive experience in broadcast management or media operations, preferably in television.
	Proven leadership and team management skills.
	Strong financial acumen and experience managing budgets.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to think strategically and make data-driven decisions.
	Knowledge of broadcast technology, content management systems, and audience analytics.


Preferred:


	Experience with digital media, social media strategy, and multi-platform content distribution.
	Familiarity with regulatory frameworks governing television and media operations.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
	Opportunity to lead and shape the growth of a developing TV station.
	Dynamic, creative, and collaborative work environment.


Application Closing Date: 16th December, 2025. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: firstnextofficial@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Marketing Manager – TV Station

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Overview


	We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Marketing Manager to lead the promotion and growth of our TV station. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies that increase audience engagement, expand reach, and strengthen the brand.
	This role requires a combination of creativity, strategic thinking, and hands-on experience in social media management and stakeholder collaboration.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to promote the TV station’s programming, events, and initiatives.
	Plan and implement campaigns to increase audience reach, engagement, and loyalty.
	Oversee the station’s presence across social media platforms, ensuring consistent messaging, content creation, and community management.
	Collaborate with internal teams, including production, content, and sales, to align marketing strategies with organizational goals.
	Build and maintain relationships with external stakeholders, such as advertisers, sponsors, media partners, and influencers.
	Analyze marketing performance using analytics tools, reporting insights and recommending improvements to maximize impact.
	Manage marketing budgets effectively, ensuring campaigns are cost-efficient and deliver measurable results.
	Stay updated on media and marketing trends, emerging technologies, and audience preferences to inform innovative strategies.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or a related field with 3 years experience.
	Proven experience in marketing, preferably in media, television, or digital platforms.
	Strong expertise in social media management, digital marketing, and audience engagement strategies.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills.
	Ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams and external stakeholders.
	Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
	Creative mindset with the ability to develop innovative marketing campaigns.


Preferred:


	Experience working in the television or broadcast industry.
	Knowledge of content marketing, SEO, and paid advertising campaigns.
	Project management skills with the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
	Opportunity to shape the growth and visibility of a developing TV station.
	A collaborative, dynamic, and creative work environment.


Application Closing Date: 16th December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: firstnextofficial@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
